details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Warrior to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Warrior, powerful and defensive' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Warrior, talk to Dances with Balrog to accept a quest called 'Way of the Fighter'. Completing the quest will make you a Fighter and you will be on the path to a Hero. Fighter is the 2nd job of Hero

build: -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Advanced Combo Attack - Reinforce and Boss Rush
  • Advanced Final Attack - Opportunity
  • Raging Blow - Reinforce and Extra Strike

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.desc: Slashes forward
Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.desc: Dive downwards towards nearby platforms below
details: Can only be used while in the air
Can also be activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and Attack Key together
For both, you can also press the Left or Right Arrow Key instead to dive towards the desired direction

primary.desc: Slashes forward twice

details:
[Active 1]: Pulls enemies toward you with a chance to stun
  • Grants Combo Orbs for any stunned enemies
[Active 2]: If used while pressing the Down Arrow Key, you are pulled instead towards the furthest enemy within range but does not stun

primary.desc: When activated, there is a chance to gain a Combo Orb (up to 5) when attacking
details: Grants bonus Attack for each Combo Orb
Right-clicking the icon in your Skill UI will toggle the visual effect on/off

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Increases %Damage Reduction and grants flat attack
details: Additionally while active, when you take damage, you deal some back

primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit
Slashes forward several times
Dash forward while pushing enemies back
Strikes forward with a chance to inflict a debuff
details:
[Debuff]: Reduces %Attack and %Accuracy (Blind debuff)
  • Duration is halved for bosses
Consumes 2 Combo Orbs, subsequent use within a short period of time increases amount of Combo Orbs consumed

primary.desc: Creates a shockwave that damages nearby enemies
details: If used when holding Down Arrow Key, attack range is decreased but has a chance to stun enemies
Consumes 1 Combo Orb

primary.desc: Launch up into the air
details:
Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together
  • Right-clicking the skill will lock it, preventing input activation

primary.desc: Increases %Final Damage for each Combo Orb and increases chance to gain Combo Orbs
details: Additionally, when you are hit, you have a chance to create a Combo Orb

primary.desc: Slashes forward furiously
details: The final blow is a guaranteed Critical Hit
When Enranged, attack deals increased %Damage and the last 2 final blows are guaranteed Critical Hits

primary.desc: Strikes forward while applying a damaging debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes more %Crit Damage
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of
Consumes 1 Combo Orb

primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs
When toggled, you can only attack one enemy but you gain increased %Final Damage and %Crit Damage
details: Consumes 1 Combo Orb to enable

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Increases %Final Damage per Combo Orb
Increases max number of Combo Orbs
Grants chance to gain double Combo Orbs
Increases activation chance, %Damage, and number of hits
Now grants flat Attack
Raging Blow is enhanced when this buff is active

hyperActive.desc: Creates a massive explosion that damages nearby enemies

fifthMain.name: Burning Soul Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, Summon Duration: 72 sec. Press the skill key again to have the blade stay put (It will respawn if you stray too far). While near blade, Raging Blow is boosted.
When you use an offensive skill, attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times every 1 sec with 50% bonus Critical Rate.
Normal - Damage: 620% (While enraged: 700%)
Stationary - Damage: 565% (While enraged: 615%)
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a sword that attacks whenever you attack
details: Pressing the skill key again will make it stationary and attack nearby enemies
Raging Blow is enhanced when this skill is active

fifthMain.name: Worldreaver
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Combo Orbs Used: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 14, Invulnerable while casting.\nOn hit, increases Final Damage for 5 sec by the Final Damage bonus of the Combo Orbs consumed for this skill.\nCooldown: 20 sec
fifthMain.desc: Slices nearby enemies in half dealing tremendous damage
details: Consumes 6 Combo Orbs
%Final Damage from Combo Orbs is increased briefly when used

fifthMain.name: Instinctual Combo
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Can be used if you have at least 1 Combo Orb. MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 30 sec
The Combo Orb increases Final Damage, damage to bosses, and Attack Power by 17%. Decreases the chance of charging Combo Orbs by 50%
Tear in Space: Periodically activates a rift 3 time(s). Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6. Cannot charge the Combo Orb with the Tear in Space.
Cooldown: 240 sec
fifthMain.desc: Enhances Raging Blow to create a 'Tear in Space'
details: Increases Combo Orb bonuses of %Final Damage, %Boss Damage, and Attack
Decreases chance of obtaining Combo Orbs by 50%

fifthMain.name: Sword Illusion
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 700, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 250%, Attack Count: 4, Chase Cut Activation Count: 12. Afterwards, activates 5 explosion(s), which attack 5 time(s) for 500% damage.\nCooldown: 30
fifthMain.desc: Slashes furiously in front of you
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Hero is a STR warrior class part of the Explorers. This class is known for its strong bossing capabilities and strong 5th job skills but has a linear playstyle and poor mobility
